attributes.action: Create more safe places to park a motorcycle.
attributes.additional_details: An independent report to show some statistics relevant to this petition. http://www.asgardsss.co.uk/motorcycle-theft-statistics
attributes.background:
Motorcycle theft has reached an alarming level in the last couple of years.
If there were ground/ wall anchors that motorcyclists could lock their bike to, it would at least make it a bit harder for theives to take.

rejection.details:
Local councils are responsible for public parking.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
